segment.source: You can also specify custom USBFN settings in a manufacturing profile that are only used when the device is in manufacturing mode.
segment.target: You can also specify custom USBFN settings in a manufacturing profile that are only used when the device is in manufacturing mode.

segment.source: You can also specify custom USBFN settings in a manufacturing profile that are only used when the device is in manufacturing mode.
segment.target: You can also specify custom USBFN settings in a manufacturing profile that are only used when the device is in manufacturing mode.

segment.source: When the device is not in Manufacturing Mode, USBFN settings will still be read from the normal location.
segment.target: When the device is not in Manufacturing Mode, USBFN settings will still be read from the normal location.

segment.source: When the device is in Manufacturing Mode and Manufacturing Mode-specific settings have been provided, the settings are from a different location.
segment.target: When the device is in Manufacturing Mode and Manufacturing Mode-specific settings have been provided, the settings are from a different location.

segment.source: If no settings have been provided in the active manufacturing profile, the settings will be read from the normal location.
segment.target: If no settings have been provided in the active manufacturing profile, the settings will be read from the normal location.

segment.source: This allows you to use different settings when the device is in manufacturing mode versus when it is not.
segment.target: This allows you to use different settings when the device is in manufacturing mode versus when it is not.
